node.title: Louis Vuitton's star designer Virgil Abloh dies of cancer
node.alt: A man wearing a hoodie in front of a grey background.
node.description: Designer Virgil Abloh, a leading fashion executive hailed as the Karl Lagerfeld of his generation, has died of cancer.
node.content: ["Designer Virgil Abloh, a leading fashion executive hailed as the Karl Lagerfeld of his generation, has died of\u00a0cancer. He was 41.", "His emploer LVMH\u00a0(Louis Vuitton Mo\u00ebt Hennessy) said Abloh had been dealing with\u00a0cancer privately for years.", "\"We are all shocked after this terrible news. Virgil was not only a genius designer, a visionary, he was also a man with a beautiful soul and great wisdom,\" Bernard Arnault, chairman and chief executive of LVMH, said in a statement.", "Abloh\u00a0was the menswear designer of Louis Vuitton.", "A statement from Abloh's family on the designer's Instagram account said Abloh had been managing cardiac angiosarcoma, a rare form of cancer in which a tumour occurs in the heart,\u00a0for the past two years.", "\"He chose to endure his battle privately since his diagnosis in 2019, undergoing numerous challenging treatments, all while helming several significant institutions that span fashion, art, and culture,\"\u00a0the statement read.", "Abloh is survived by his wife Shannon Abloh and his children, Lowe and Grey.", "More to come."]
